# SplitBuddy - GitHub Copilot Instructions

This is a smart bill-splitting application built with React, TypeScript, and Vite.

## Project Overview
- **Tech Stack**: React 18, TypeScript, Vite, Tesseract.js
- **Features**: OCR receipt scanning, participant management, item assignment, smart bill splitting
- **Theme**: Modern green and white color scheme (#10b981, #059669, #d1fae5)

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript `type` imports for all type-only imports
- Follow React functional component patterns with hooks
- Use CSS for styling with scoped component stylesheets
- Maintain modular structure: components, utils, types
